Name: On Closer Inspection
About the game: On Closer Inspection is a series of immersive 360-degree experiences developed by the Australian War Memorial. Through the use of 360-degree video and VR technology you can explore and interact with some of the Memorial's historic large technology objects inside and out. Mark IV tank The first in the series is the Mark IV tank ‘Grit’ from the First World War. Bushmaster The Bushmaster is an Australian-built, all-wheel-drive Protected Mobility Vehicle (PMV). Designed and first produced in Bendigo, Victoria, in 1998 by Thales Australia (formerly ADI Limited) the Bushmaster is considered one of the most successful military vehicles in operation today. Adelaide Class FFG Explore the Royal Australian Navy’s Adelaide class FFG frigate and take a closer look at HMAS Sydney IV both inside and out. The Adelaide class FFG is considered by many to be one of the most capable warships in the Royal Australian Navy’s history. Hudson Bomber Explore the Memorial’s Hudson bomber A16-105. One of 52 Mark IV A Model Hudsons used by the RAAF during the Second World War.
